statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, engagement_date, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT DISTINCT app_id FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY app_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_duration > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_action = 'click';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE app_id = '5a00e717-0b50-4f02-940a-6a5684735801' AND engagement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE app_id = '5a00e717-0b50-4f02-940a-6a5684735801' ORDER BY engagement_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_action FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_duration > 60 AND engagement_action = 'click' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT app_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY app_id HAVING total_engagements > 2 ORDER BY total_engagements DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(app_id) FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, date, time FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT strategy_name, platform, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 75 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, date, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, date, time FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE time > '12:00:00' ORDER BY date, time ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, platform FROM marketing_strategies WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_metrics WHERE session_id = 12345;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, interaction_count FROM user_campaign_engagement WHERE user_id = 56789;
SELECT * FROM user_metrics ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-05-31';
SELECT user_id, session_id, engagement_score FROM user_metrics WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, interaction_count FROM user_campaign_engagement WHERE user_id = 2001 AND interaction_count > 10 ORDER BY interaction_count ASC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM user_metrics GROUP BY session_id
SELECT u.user_id, u.engagement_score, c.campaign_name FROM user_metrics u JOIN user_campaign_engagement e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN marketing_campaigns c ON e.campaign_id = c.campaign_id
SELECT user_id, user_name, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, device_type FROM device_tracking WHERE device_type = 'android';
SELECT app_id, installation_date, user_id FROM app_installation WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM app_installation INNER JOIN user_engagement_metrics ON app_installation.user_id = user_engagement_metrics.user_id;
SELECT user_name, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM device_tracking GROUP BY user_id HAVING device_count > 3;
SELECT device_type, MAX(last_active_timestamp) AS last_active FROM device_tracking GROUP BY device_type ORDER BY last_active DESC;
SELECT user_id, installation_date FROM app_installation WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM device_tracking WHERE device_type='mobile');
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_time, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_event = 'click';
SELECT user_id, engagement_time, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget, campaign_status FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_value FROM conversion_events WHERE event_value > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_event = 'click'
SELECT user_id, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_duration > INTERVAL '5 minutes'
SELECT user_id, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_duration < INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 5
